item.title: Bb84: a soft intro to Quantum Computing
Background: bulletz.io
item.description: bulletz.io is a browser game written entirely in Elixir using the phoenix framework. Developing a game in a functional programming language features a variety of unique challenges.

item.title: Luke
item.description: SURF | SKI | SWE This blog is dedicated to sharing knowledge on both technical and non-technical topics in a useful way for others. The target demographic is primarily software engineers who may be facing similar challenges to me in their software development. Each blog post has a picture of the place I was when I wrote it. This adds a little context to who I am as a person outside of my life as a developer.
